omatsivut.title: Applications and accepting an offer of admission
omatsivut.subtitle: Follow your admission process. You do not need to register or log in in order to apply.
omatsivut.label: On applications page you can:
omatsivut.item1: view your applications and make modifications to them during application period
omatsivut.item2: see the results of student admissions
omatsivut.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

koski.title: My completed studies (Only available in Finnish/Swedish)
koski.subtitle: View and share information about your studies
koski.label: Study information available:
koski.item1: Basic education and secondary education from 2018 onwards
koski.item3: Higher education from 1995 onwards (varies by higher education institution)
koski.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

ehoks.title: eHOKS - Personal Competence Development Plan (Only available in Finnish/Swedish)
ehoks.subtitle: eHOKS is a service for planning professional studies. The Personal Competence Development Plan is a practical tool for students, teachers in vocational schools and tutors in  workplaces.
ehoks.label: The service is available for:
ehoks.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

varda.title: The national data warehouse for early childhood education and care Varda (Only available in Finnish/Swedish)
varda.subtitle: View information stored in Varda, the national data warehouse on early childhood education and care.
varda.label: You can view the following information about you and your child:
varda.item1: early childhood education and care data about your child
varda.item2: your own fees on early childhood education and care
varda.item3: your employment data if you work in early childhood education and care
varda.link: Proceed to view information stored in Varda
varda.linkLoggedOut: Proceed to view information stored in Varda (requires identification)
varda.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

varda-rekisterointi.title: Registration of private early childhood education providers for Varda (Only available in Finnish/Swedish)
varda-rekisterointi.subtitle: A private early childhood education service provider (private daycare, family daycare, or group family daycare) registers information about their organization in the national data warehouse for early childhood education and care.
varda-rekisterointi.label: The data to be registered are:
varda-rekisterointi.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

oti.title: OTI - Registration for the certificate in educational administration exam (Only available in Finnish/Swedish)
oti.subtitle: Register for a certificate in educational administration exam.
oti.label: When registering for a exam for certificate in education administration, please follow the instructions:
oti.item1: search for a test centre through the link below
oti.item2: enter your personal and contact details in the registration system
oti.item3: pay exam fee as you register
oti.link: Proceed to certificate in educational administration exam registration
oti.linkLoggedOut: Proceed to certificate in educational administration exam registration
oti.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

yki.title: YKI - Registration for the National Certificate of Language Proficiency tests
yki.subtitle: Register for a language proficiency test (YKI).
yki.label: When registering for a Finnish National Language Proficiency test (YKI), please follow the instructions:
yki.item1: search for a test centre through the link below
yki.item2: enter your personal and contact details in the registration system
yki.item3: you will get an email with a payment link
yki.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.

virkailija.title: Education admin's Studyinfo (Available mostly in Finnish/Swedish)
virkailija.subtitle: Use education administration services provided by the Finnish National Agency for Education (EDUFI). In order to use the services, you need separate access rights for them.
virkailija.label: You can log in to admin's Studyinfo via:
virkailija.linkUsingValtuudet: You can proceed to this service after you have logged out of the current e-Authorizations session.
